entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 07:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -28.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
